Package io.github.jlbabilino.curvemapping

Class SplineCurve

java.lang.Object
io.github.jlbabilino.curvemapping.Curve
io.github.jlbabilino.curvemapping.SplineCurve
public class SplineCurve
extends Curve
This class maps the value of a stick input to a spline curve. It is a subclass of Curve. For LINEAR curves, the points provided represent the vertecies of a linear spline plotted on a graph (like a line graph). For SMOOTH curves, the points provided represent the critical points on the graph of the curve. The only exception to this is when points.length is equal to 2 in which it will always be a linear spline between the two points. For RIGHT_STEP or LEFT_STEP curves, the points provided represent the points on a step function plotted on a graph. In RIGHT_STEP curves, the value on the interval between points is determined by the value of the rightmost point in the interval. In LEFT_STEP curves, the value on the interval between points is determined by the value of the leftmost point in the interval.

  • Constructor Details

    • SplineCurve

      public SplineCurve​(SplineType splineType, double[][] points, double offset, double scalar, double deadzone)
      Constructs an Spline Curve object which can be used to map a stick input based on a custom curve profile. Initialized with values provided.
      Parameters:
      splineType - type of spline
      points - array of points used in spline
      offset - value used to offset the final curve
      scalar - value used to scale the value before offset
      deadzone - value for the width of the deadband in the center of the curve

    • SplineCurve

      public SplineCurve()
      Constructs an Spline Curve object which can be used to map a stick input based on a custom curve profile. Initialized with default values: splineType = SplineType.LINEAR; points = new double[][]{{-1.0, -1.0}, {0.0, 0.0}, {1.0, 1.0}}; offset = 0.0; scalar = 1.0; deadzone = 0.0;

  • Method Details

    • calculateMappedVal

      public double calculateMappedVal​(double input)
      Calculates and returns the final value mapped based on the curve provided.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      mapped value

    • getCurvePoints

      public double[][] getCurvePoints​(int pointCount)
      Returns a set of points of length pointCount on the curve.
      Parameters:
      pointCount - the amount of points on the curve
      Returns:
      a 2D double array of points on the curve
